persona_link.cache.storage package¶

Submodules¶

persona_link.cache.storage.azure_storage module¶

Azure storage for cache

class persona_link.cache.storage.azure_storage.AzureStorage¶

Bases: BaseCacheStorage

Azure storage for cache. Requires ENV vars to be set for connection string and container name

async delete(path: str) → None¶

Delete the data from the given path

async deleteAll(avatarId: str) → None¶

Delete all the data for the given avatar

async get(path: str) → str¶

Get the url for the given path

async put(avatarId: str, data: bytes | AsyncGenerator[bytes, None], filename: str, content_type: ContentType) → str¶

Put the file in the avatarId folder and return the path

persona_link.cache.storage.base_storage module¶

class persona_link.cache.storage.base_storage.BaseCacheStorage¶

Bases: ABC

Base class for storage of video/audio files. Storage can be file system, cloud storage, etc. The storage will store files in avatarId/file format. This way it will be possible to delete all files for a given persona_link.

abstract async delete(path: str) → None¶

Delete the data from the given path

abstract async deleteAll(avatarId: str) → None¶

Delete all the data for the given avatar

abstract async get(path: str) → str | None¶

Get the url for the given path

abstract async put(avatarId: str, data: bytes | AsyncGenerator[bytes, None], filename: str, content_type: ContentType) → str¶

Put the file in the avatarId folder and return the path
